verses.verse: And they took their journey <WH5265> <WH8799> from Elim <WH362>, and all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the wilderness <WH4057> of Sin <WH5512>, which is between Elim <WH362> and Sinai <WH5514>, on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320> after their departing out <WH3318> <WH8800> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And the whole congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> <WH8735> against Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> in the wilderness <WH4057>:

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Would to 'Elohim <WH4310> <WH5414> <WH8799> we had died <WH4191> <WH8800> by the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, when we sat <WH3427> <WH8800> by the flesh <WH1320> pots <WH5518>, and when we did eat <WH398> <WH8800> bread <WH3899> to the full <WH7648>; for ye have brought us forth <WH3318> <WH8689> into this wilderness <WH4057>, to kill <WH4191> <WH8687> this whole assembly <WH6951> with hunger <WH7458>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Behold, I will rain <WH4305> <WH8688> bread <WH3899> from heaven <WH8064> for you; and the people <WH5971> shall go out <WH3318> <WH8804> and gather <WH3950> <WH8804> a certain rate <WH1697> every day <WH3117> <WH3117>, that I may prove <WH5254> <WH8762> them, whether they will walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in my Torah <WH8451>, or no.

And it shall come to pass, that on the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117> they shall prepare <WH3559> <WH8689> that which <WH834> they bring in <WH935> <WH8686>; and it shall be twice <WH4932> as much as they gather <WH3950> <WH8799> daily <WH3117> <WH3117>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, At even <WH6153>, then ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> hath brought you out <WH3318> <WH8689> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:

And in the morning <WH1242>, then ye shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068>; for that he heareth <WH8085> <WH8800> your murmurings <WH8519> against the YY <WH3068>: and what are we <WH5168>, that ye murmur <WH3885> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH3885> <WH8735> against us?

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, This shall be, when the YY <WH3068> shall give <WH5414> <WH8800> you in the evening <WH6153> flesh <WH1320> to eat <WH398> <WH8800>, and in the morning <WH1242> bread <WH3899> to the full <WH7646> <WH8800>; for that the YY <WH3068> heareth <WH8085> <WH8800> your murmurings <WH8519> which ye murmur <WH3885> <WH8688> against him: and what are we <WH5168>? your murmurings <WH8519> are not against us, but against the YY <WH3068>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Aharon <WH175>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Come near <WH7126> <WH8798> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: for he hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> your murmurings <WH8519>.

And it came to pass, as Aharon <WH175> spake <WH1696> <WH8763> unto the whole congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that they looked <WH6437> <WH8799> toward the wilderness <WH4057>, and, behold, the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> in the cloud <WH6051>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the murmurings <WH8519> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, At even <WH996> <WH6153> ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> flesh <WH1320>, and in the morning <WH1242> ye shall be filled <WH7646> <WH8799> with bread <WH3899>; and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.

And it came to pass, that at even <WH6153> the quails <WH7958> came up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the camp <WH4264>: and in the morning <WH1242> the dew <WH2919> lay <WH7902> round about <WH5439> the host <WH4264>.

And when the dew <WH2919> that lay <WH7902> was gone up <WH5927> <WH8799>, behold, upon the face <WH6440> of the wilderness <WH4057> there lay a small <WH1851> round thing <WH2636> <WH8794>, as small <WH1851> as the hoar frost <WH3713> on the ground <WH776>.

And when the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> it, they said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, It is manna <WH4478>: for they wist <WH3045> <WH8804> not what it was. And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, This is the bread <WH3899> which the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you to eat <WH402>.

This is the thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the YY <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>, Gater <WH3950> <WH8798> of it every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400>, an omer <WH6016> for every man <WH1538>, according to the number <WH4557> of your persons <WH5315>; take <WH3947> <WH8799> ye every man <WH376> for them which are in his tents <WH168>.
And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so, and gathered <WH3950> <WH8799>, some more <WH7235> <WH8688>, some less <WH4591> <WH8688>.

And when they did mete <WH4058> <WH8799> it with an omer <WH6016>, he that gathered much <WH7235> <WH8688> had nothing over <WH5736> <WH8689>, and he that gathered little <WH4591> <WH8688> had no lack <WH2637> <WH8689>; they gathered <WH3950> <WH8804> every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let no man <WH376> leave <WH3498> <WH8686> of it till the morning <WH1242>.

Notwithstanding they hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto Mosheh <WH4872>; but some <WH582> of them left <WH3498> <WH8686> of it until the morning <WH1242>, and it bred <WH7311> <WH8799> worms <WH8438>, and stank <WH887> <WH8799>: and Mosheh <WH4872> was wroth <WH7107> <WH8799> with them.

And they gathered <WH3950> <WH8799> it every morning <WH1242>, every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400>: and when the sun <WH8121> waxed hot <WH2552> <WH8804>, it melted <WH4549> <WH8738>.

And it came to pass, that on the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117> they gathered <WH3950> <WH8804> twice <WH4932> as much bread <WH3899>, two <WH8147> omers <WH6016> for one <WH259> man: and all the rulers <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> came <WH935> <WH8799> and told <WH5046> <WH8686> Mosheh <WH4872>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, This is that which the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765>, To morrow <WH4279> is the rest <WH7677> of the holy <WH6944> sabbath <WH7676> unto the YY <WH3068>: bake <WH644> <WH8798> that which ye will bake <WH644> <WH8799> to day, and seethe <WH1310> <WH8761> that ye will seethe <WH1310> <WH8762>; and that which <WH3605> remaineth over <WH5736> <WH8802> lay up <WH3240> <WH8685> for you to be kept <WH4931> until the morning <WH1242>.
And they laid it up <WH3240> <WH8686> till the morning <WH1242>, as Mosheh <WH4872> bade <WH6680> <WH8765>: and it did not stink <WH887> <WH8689>, neither was there any worm <WH7415> therein.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Eat <WH398> <WH8798> that to day <WH3117>; for to day <WH3117> is a sabbath <WH7676> unto the YY <WH3068>: to day <WH3117> ye shall not find <WH4672> <WH8799> it in the field <WH7704>.
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> ye shall gather <WH3950> <WH8799> it; but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, which is the sabbath <WH7676>, in it there shall be none.
And it came to pass, that there went out <WH3318> <WH8804> some of the people <WH5971> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> for to gather <WH3950> <WH8800>, and they found <WH4672> <WH8804> none.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, How long refuse <WH3985> <WH8765> ye to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> my Mitzvot <WH4687> and my Torahs <WH8451> ?

See <WH7200> <WH8798>, for that the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you the sabbath <WH7676>, therefore he giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> you on the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117> the bread <WH3899> of two days <WH3117>; abide <WH3427> <WH8798> ye every man <WH376> in his place, let no man <WH376> go out <WH3318> <WH8799> of his place <WH4725> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>.
So the people <WH5971> rested <WH7673> <WH8799> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>.

And the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> thereof Manna <WH4478>: and it was like coriander <WH1407> seed <WH2233>, white <WH3836>; and the taste <WH2940> of it was like wafers <WH6838> made with honey <WH1706>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, This is the thing <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> commandeth <WH6680> <WH8765>, Fill <WH4393> an omer <WH6016> of it to be kept <WH4931> for your generations <WH1755>; that they may see <WH7200> <WH8799> the bread <WH3899> wherewith I have fed <WH398> <WH8689> you in the wilderness <WH4057>, when I brought you forth <WH3318> <WH8687> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Aharon <WH175>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> a <WH259> pot <WH6803>, and put <WH5414> <WH8798> an omer <WH6016> full <WH4393> of manna <WH4478> therein, and lay it up <WH3240> <WH8685> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, to be kept <WH4931> for your generations <WH1755>.
As the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>, so Aharon <WH175> laid it up <WH3240> <WH8686> before <WH6440> the Testimony <WH5715>, to be kept <WH4931>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did eat <WH398> <WH8804> manna <WH4478> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, until they came <WH935> <WH8800> to a land <WH776> inhabited <WH3427> <WH8737>; they did eat <WH398> <WH8804> manna <WH4478>, until they came <WH935> <WH8800> unto the borders <WH7097> of the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>.
Now an omer <WH6016> is the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374>.
